page.title: 05WILDLIFE AND COUNTRY WALKS
page.content: There are{15}miles of nature wayfaring trails throughout the grounds, the longest being{6.5}miles. There is also a disabled persons nature trail. Wayfaring courses are run throughout the year from the Base Camp _ a hutted area with accommodation for{32}people. The grounds are rich in wildlife as the estate is a protected area. {Otters, roe deer, mink}and{grey {squirrel}abound.{Red squirrel}are also found which is very rare in this part of the country. A great variety of birds, both resident and migratory, are to be found, the more unusual of the residents being{drumming {woodpeckers}and{jays.} In the many ponds{brown trout, perch, {pike, lampern}and the very rare{ {vendace}are found.
